title: Rinkeby Faucet: No Ethereum address found to fund
body:
this is the tweet that clearly contains an ethereum address: https://twitter.com/mr_ligi/status/1268171687159357443

![Rinkeby: Authenticated Faucet - Brave_579](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/111600/83642075-a6d39c80-a5ae-11ea-9e0b-bccf9b769eb5.png)

Guess there is something off with the twitter connection

Looks like we have the same issue with the goerli faucet:
https://goerli-faucet.dappnode.net/
also with the https://yolonet.xyz - but this one at least has the fallback to plain addresses
People now also start complaining on reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/ethereum/comments/gvsfaf/rinkeby_faucet_not_allowing_me_to_gain_test_eth/

The issue still exist.
![Screenshot 2020-12-20 at 9 26 21 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/25434034/102714521-022a6980-430a-11eb-9167-b559d3e88ed5.png)
same problem with facebook posts, too
same problem on twitter,  and facebook  says invalid facebook post url
Is there an alternative method of getting ether ?
Please send me your address and how much rinkeby ether you need

Hi @ligi thank you. 
I need roughly about 15 ether : 0x151efe3c9612AC77E112a39944Cd119ECC7817C8

@pramhedadev 
https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x58adbfb87a042546106442112eafa8dff000041a4599ae5d9255319e45beb23e

> @pramhedadev
> https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x58adbfb87a042546106442112eafa8dff000041a4599ae5d9255319e45beb23e

Thank you. I received it

can I get 15 RETH as well: 0xD37ba182d8528E2EcA85fba497C804EDC84A8324
ty
@mehulsc 0xD37ba182d8528E2EcA85fba497C804EDC84A8324

Hi @ligi can I get 18.75 RETH: 0x41f038C12D2A93009a5DA3B99e063235fdf93303

Thank you for your help!
@ktym1 https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x8229bad893cef32cf0deb315848173b10ba94a52a496ca4a18371ac98acaee67

> @ktym1 https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x8229bad893cef32cf0deb315848173b10ba94a52a496ca4a18371ac98acaee67

Thank you!
@ligi can i get 20 RETH :  0x94EaDfdD92076932c04d8F5D01B379C09212EeF8
@ZazzyDictionary wondering why you need 20 - this is more than you would get from the faucet. Greed or real need?-)

https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/pull/21172
seems like the solution of switching over to mobile twitter doesn't work anymore

doing some quick tests, `http.Get` returns -> `This browser is no longer supported`

faking it with a iPhone/Chrome user agent returns -> `JavaScript is not available.....`

not sure what the solution could be here, executing requests with a headless browser api?
@ligi i am not sure when will i get the chance to get more Reth so i guess i will take what i can get haha :)

@ZazzyDictionary I send you 4 - LMK when you used them and need more. Then I will check if you used them wisely or just blew it all and send you more depending on this check ;-)

@therealssj thanks for looking into this. The problem is that there are now 2 issues at play: the twitter communication and the communication with the network (as also other methods other than twitter do not work)

@ligi i guess 15 would help finish: https://ethernaut.openzeppelin.com/ (idk)

0xEB9366Eb2735E8E2FC7eCBCCAFA213068fc181dB
@Holger-Will for something like this always: https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x6bf1b5f2d844b320a2eb18767cd9de925d5cf8c0060b9a9db30657123dff1adf

Hi there, I'm a developer at IDEX and our sandbox environment's automated load generator often runs through RIN due to users taking the bot's orders. It would be very helpful to obtain a larger amount of RIN to support this use case, but also the standard 18.75 would be great to 0x36915be02c6e9b3a7ffa342cfb81c080dc48e0ab. Thank you!
@dileepfrog 42 for you: https://rinkeby.etherscan.io/tx/0x349fb6094b22eed7d93aa1728c6b1be082b4297ba97432de111e6c56f81bdcc0

hi @ligi I've been having the same problem with  Rinkeby website no matter how many times I tweet it says No ethereum address is found to fund. Could you send 18.75 eth  to 0x343A53A1E8b17beDd15F47a28195Bc8C120d4443, I'm trying to test my algorithm

Hi @ligi, would it be possible for you to send over 15 ETH on Rinkeby to 0xdB8F136534e2ad78D988f167E9852dd7E09336fA? I am beginning to pursue smart contract development and some ETH to get started would be very much appreciated. Thank you!
Hi @ligi can i get some tokens on this account 0x26f5061c62115aba83c2Fd180b32a304Df6Ca8Be i wanna test my smart contract
